com.jidesoft.chart.fit
Class FunctionMap

java.lang.Object
  com.jidesoft.chart.fit.FunctionMap

public class FunctionMap
extends Object

Author:
Simon White (swhite@catalysoft.com) The idea is to provide a class that, given a chart model and an x or y value, can read off the corresponding value from the other axis. This assumes straight lines to join up consecutive points in the chart model.
